nodes.text: A fleet was used by the Pommrio family of the Chiss Ascendancy, and consisted of a cruiser and several patrol ships. The fleet was brought into service when a family emergency was declared, gathering Pommrio officers and warriors from the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet above Sarvchi. The Pommrio Fleet was present for a skirmish above Hoxim, the culmination of a plot to destroy the Chiss Ascendancy.
